item.title: Report X-2023081704
item.description:
Report X-2023081704

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-22T15:12:14+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-18
  • City: MADISON
  • State: AL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: THE PACKAGE WAS ON THE ROLLER WHEN LOCATED, UNABLE TO DETERMINE IF INADEQUATE LOADING WAS A FACTOR. THE PACKAGE WAS SECURED WITH PLASTIC AND TAKEN TO THE QA CAGE. DescribePack: THERE WERE NO HOLES OR PUNCTURES, THE PACKAGE LEAKED FROM THE CAPS WHICH CAUSED A PUDDLE INSIDE THE BAG. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: WHEN FOUND, THE PACKAGE WAS PUT IN A PLASTIC BAG AND TAKEN STRAIGHT TO THE QA CAGE.
